field.name: $typeTags
field.viewer:
<>
			                      {typeSelect == 1 && <Badge bg="info">{_t('Internal move')}</Badge>}
			                      {typeSelect == 2 && <Badge bg="info">{_t('Outgoing move')}</Badge>}
			                      {typeSelect == 3 && <Badge bg="info">{_t('Incoming move')}</Badge>}
			                  </>

field.name: $invoicingTags
field.viewer:
<>
							{invoicingStatusSelect == 0 && <Badge bg="danger">{_t('Not invoiced')}</Badge>}
							{invoicingStatusSelect == 1 && <Badge bg="warning">{_t('Partially invoiced')}</Badge>}
							{invoicingStatusSelect == 2 && <Badge bg="success">{_t('Invoiced')}</Badge>}
							{invoicingStatusSelect == 3 && <Badge bg="warning">{_t('Delayed invoicing')}</Badge>}
							{invoicingStatusSelect == 4 && <Badge bg="success">{_t('Validated for invoicing')}</Badge>}
						</>

field.name: $availabilityRequestTags
field.viewer:
<>
									{pickingIsEdited && statusSelect == 2 && <Badge bg="warning">{_t('Picking printed')}</Badge>}
									{availabilityRequest && statusSelect == 2 && <Badge bg="success">{_t('Availability request')}</Badge>}
								</>

button.name: realizeBtn
button.title: Realize
button.prompt: Are you sure you want to realize this stock move?

field.name: exTaxTotal
field.viewer: <> <Box as="dl" d="grid" gridTemplateColumns="1fr 1fr"> <Box as="dt" m={0} py={1} fontWeight="normal" fontSize={5}>{_t('Total W.T.')}</Box> <Box as="dd" m={0} py={1} fontWeight="bold" fontSize={5}>{$fmt('exTaxTotal')}</Box> </Box> </>

field.name: partner
field.domain: self.isContact = false AND :company member of self.companySet

field.name: exTaxTotal
field.viewer: <> <Box as="dl" d="grid" gridTemplateColumns="1fr 1fr"> <Box as="dt" m={0} py={1} fontWeight="normal" fontSize={5}>{_t('Total W.T.')}</Box> <Box as="dd" m={0} py={1} fontWeight="bold" fontSize={5}>{$fmt('exTaxTotal')}</Box> </Box> </>

field.name: partner
field.domain: self.isContact = false AND :company member of self.companySet

field.name: exTaxTotal
field.viewer: <> <Box as="dl" d="grid" gridTemplateColumns="1fr 1fr"> <Box as="dt" m={0} py={1} fontWeight="normal" fontSize={5}>{_t('Total W.T.')}</Box> <Box as="dd" m={0} py={1} fontWeight="bold" fontSize={5}>{$fmt('exTaxTotal')}</Box> </Box> </>

panel-related.name: stockMoveLineListPanel
panel-related.title: Stock move lines
panel-related.readonlyIf: company == null || fromStockLocation == null || toStockLocation == null || statusSelect == 3

field.name: carrierPartner
field.domain: self.isCarrier = TRUE AND (self.companySet IS EMPTY OR :company MEMBER OF self.companySet)

field.name: forwarderPartner
field.domain: self.isContact = FALSE AND (self.isCarrier = TRUE OR self.isSupplier = TRUE) AND :company MEMBER OF self.companySet

panel.name: stockMoveCommentsPanel
panel.title: Comment to display on stock move

panel.name: pickingOrderCommentsPanel
panel.title: Comment to display on picking order

field.name: $msg
field.viewer: <> {(typeSelect == 2 || (typeSelect == 1 && fromStockLocation.typeSelect == 1)) && {_t('Do you want to generate backorder for not delivered quantities?')}} {(typeSelect == 3 || (typeSelect == 1 && fromStockLocation.typeSelect == 3)) && {_t('Do you want to generate backorder for not received quantities?')}}

field.name: $msg
field.viewer:
<>
{_t('This stock move will have a huge impact (more than')} {$percentToleranceForWapChange} {_t('%) on the WAP of')} {$productsWithError}. {_t('Do you want to proceed?')}

alert.message: The move doesn't contain any product, do you wish to continue ?

error.message: Both source location address and delivery (to) address are required to define the delivery itinerary
Please fill in the source (from) location address to get the delivery itinerary.
Please fill in the delivery (to) address to get the delivery itinerary.
Please filled supplier shipment date and supplier shipment reference.

alert.message: Do you want to allocate all the products ?

error.message: Picking order has been edited for this stock move, it can not be canceled.
Please fill printing settings on following stock moves: ${__repo__(StockMove).all().filter('self.id IN ?1 AND self.printingSettings IS NULL', id?:_ids).fetch()?.collect{it.stockMoveSeq}?.join(', ')}
error.if: (id || _ids) && __repo__(StockMove).all().filter('self.id IN ?1 AND self.printingSettings IS NULL', id?:_ids).count() > 0
